articles.description: WhatsApp has released its sixth user safety monthly report. The report is in accordance with the IT Rules 2021. The user-safety report is for the month of November and contains details of the user complaints received and the corresponding action taken by What…
articles.content: WhatsApp allows users to report accounts that they think are spam, abusive or other issue. The company receives the last five messages sent to the user by the reported user or group, and they are not… [+255 chars]

articles.author: Mubarak Zeb Khan
articles.title: At 21-month high, inflation hits 12.3pc - Newspaper - DAWN.COM - DAWN.com
articles.description: The increase in inflation has been driven by a record rise in global oil prices, undermining earlier gains.
articles.content: ISLAMABAD: Prices of consumer goods continued to rise in December as inflation edged up to 12.3 per cent from 11.5pc, the largest increase recorded in nearly two years, according to the Pakistan Bure… [+3651 chars]
